title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems. I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame).
OB: When I launch the Help view, the tab key does not do anything.
EB: The tab key in the Help view should navigate through the elements and provide keyboard accessibility.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view. 
2. Attempt to navigate using the tab key. 
3. Observe that the tab key does not move focus or navigate through the elements as expected.
